scripts.deploy:dev: echo 'Set GS_BUCKET env var' && gsutil -m cp -a public-read dist/manifest.json dist/cp-gantt.js dist/viz-cp-gantt.json dist/viz-cp-gantt.css gs://$GS_BUCKET/cp-gantt/dev/ && gsutil -m setmeta -h 'Cache-Control:no-cache, max-age=0' gs://$GS_BUCKET/cp-gantt/dev/**
scripts.deploy:prod: echo 'Set GS_BUCKET and VERSION env vars' && gsutil -m cp -a public-read dist/manifest.json gs://$GS_BUCKET/cp-gantt/$VERSION/ && gsutil -m cp -a public-read dist/cp-gantt.$VERSION.js dist/viz-cp-gantt.json dist/viz-cp-gantt.css gs://$GS_BUCKET/cp-gantt/$VERSION/ && gsutil -m setmeta -h 'Cache-Control:public, max-age=86400, immutable' gs://$GS_BUCKET/cp-gantt/$VERSION/**
